import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import api from'../api';import'../static/UserDetail.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{api.get(`/users/${id}`).then(response=>setUser(response.data)).catch(error=>console.error(error));},[id]);const handleDelete=()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this user?')){api.delete(`/users/${id}`).then(()=>{navigate('/users');// Redirect to the user list after deletion
}).catch(error=>console.error('Error deleting user:',error));}};if(!user)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"User Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"First Name:"})," ",user.firstName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Last Name:"})," ",user.lastName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,className:"btn btn-danger mt-4",children:"Delete User"})]});};export default UserDetail;
